venue.name: Enterprise Center at Salem State College

item.description:
Seminar 5:30pm - 7:00pm
Meetup 7:00pm - 8:00pm

Free to the public
Free Refreshments, so bring a friend!
joegreenhome.com/events to register for the Seminar!

The City of Salem and JOEGREEN Home Solutions are teaming up to host a free seminar to discuss the Stretch Code, an eco-friendly amendment to the MA Building Code.

As one of the Green Communities of Massachusetts, Salem has committed to enforcing a higher standard of building codes in order to create a greener environment. But what does this mean to you? How can you benefit from these changes?

Come join us Thursday July 29th to learn everything you need to know about the Stretch Code, and celebrate Salem as well as other local communities' commitment to making a greener tomorrow!

We'll stick around for a while after the event to meet with each other.
item.name: Stretch Code Seminar. Free in Salem.
